description: Adversaries may establish persistence and elevate privileges by executing malicious content triggered by a Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) event subscription.
name: Powershell WMI Persistence
query: (powershell.file.script_block_text:*New\-CimInstance\ * AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*\-Namespace\ root\/subscription\ * AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*\-Property\ * AND (powershell.file.script_block_text:*\-ClassName\ __EventFilter\ * OR powershell.file.script_block_text:*\-ClassName\ CommandLineEventConsumer\ *))
author: frack113
